front.title: Multicast Avalanche Avoidance in Mobile IP (MAAMIP)

abstract.t: While it is a necessary feature that the home agent tunnels multicast packets to mobile nodes away from home, it can cause severe network congestion on the forward path between the home agent and the care-of address nodes, because of the unicast tunneling of multicast packets. Multicast avalanche avoidance in Mobile IP (MAAMIP) is designed to avoid the network congestion by using of Explicit multicast tunneling. Explicit multicast tunneling in Mobile IP enables avoidance of network congestion and realizes the true bandwidth saving, which is the primitive goal of multicast.
